== WebApps SRU Boilerplate ==

This is the boilerplate to use when filing SRU bugs for webapps packages:

<pre>
[Impact] 

* The webapp has ceased functioning due to changes in the website outside our control.

[Test Case]

* Browse to the affected website, notice it is not working.

[Regression Potential] 

* Zero, the stable release is already broken.

[Other Info]
 
* Here is the public jenkins URL with the log showing the automated test results for this fix:

</pre>
